dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6723 IH: To reaffirm the applicability of the Act of June 18, 1934, to the Samish Indian Nation, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gallego introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reaffirm the applicability of the Act of June 18, 1934, to the Samish Indian Nation, and for other purposes.

section.text: The applicability of the Act of June 18, 1934 (25 U.S.C. 5101 et seq.; 48 Stat. 984, chapter 576) (commonly known as the Indian Reorganization Act) is reaffirmed for the Samish Indian Nation.
Nothing in this Act shall be interpreted as affecting treaty rights under the Treaty of Point Elliott.
